subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets learned late Thursday that Pedro Martínez had torn a tendon in his left calf, putting an end to his injury-plagued season and jeopardizing the team’s postseason hopes.
snippet: The Mets learned late Thursday that Pedro Martínez had torn a tendon in his left calf, putting an end to his injury-plagued season and jeopardizing the team’s postseason hopes.
